item.title: Shops Won't Work. :(
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

If you get errors when you compile then compile did not complete successfully. Whatever changes you make will not work untill you can compile successfully. (With 0 errors.)

Read full topic

item.title: Shops Won't Work. :(
item.dc:creator: @Wilddar Wilddar
item.description:
@Wilddar wrote:

So I added the first shop Correctly, and it worked perfectly because I inserted this in the client.java:

If (NPCID == 682) { // Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 3; //Donie

Then this is below it:

} else if (NPCID == 553) {
// Aubury rune shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 1; // Aubury Magic Shop
}

Ok so I make my next shop, and spawn the npc successfully, and then I make the shop and items in shops.cfg. Then I insert the this code below the second code I showed you:

} else if (NPCID == 683) {
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 4;
}
//end of shops

But for some reason when I add my second shop, I shut down server, and I compile, and I get 100 errors, then I am done, I run server, and that is successful, then the second shop won’t work.

All help is appreciated.

And also I am using WinterLove Server v.3 and I am using ZodiacsReign Package Anniversary, RSPS Maker

Read full topic
